ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Gearheart
ygData.msgSnippet: When I did the quest a few times at 29 he was blue to me. He was red to a 23rd Ranger that helped out. So he had to be between 26-28th level. Not to mention
ygData.messageBody:
When I did the quest a few times at 29 he was blue to
me. He was red to a 23rd Ranger that helped out. So he
had to be between 26-28th level. Not to mention the
faeri guards will help him out. I would not have been
able to take him solo...but then again...I'm a
warrior.

the quest rewards are very disappointing for a mid
20's quest. Barbarians and Dwarves have these nice
weapons....gnomes get rawhide armor and bronze
weapons...whoohoo!

-alewuf shinkicker of povar
40th gemchopper

--- rpgmastr2k@... wrote:
> Hmm...it seems odd that your level 33 friend was
> killing and getting exp from
> it. It cons blue/green to me at _22_ and I can kill
> it with 2-3 shots of a
> magician spell. My 2cp.
> Corey
